text:
Example: Converting ending inventory and COGS from LIFO to FIFO
Witz Company, which uses LIFO, reported end-of-year inventory balances of $500 in
20X5 and $700 in 20X6. The LIFO reserve was $200 for 20X5 and $300 for 20X6.
COGS during 20X6 was $3,000. Convert 20X6 ending inventory and COGS to a
FIFO basis.
